name: zester
description: Zester is the mayor of ZESTYville. As he is SO talented, he offers a World Tour, plays a banjo in Rock Band, and goes to The Camp -weekly.
statement: We focus on entertainment because ZESTYville is so full of life. For those interested, ZESTYville is open to tourists! The only requirement for entry is a declaration of one's salary.
